scripts.android: AMBIENT='local-android' PLATFORM='android' UDID='' DEVICE='' VERSION='' APPPACKAGE='' APPACTIVITY='' npx codeceptjs run --steps --reporter mochawesome
scripts.ios: AMBIENT='local-ios' PLATFORM='iOS' UDID='8C487B61-78E7-4EA0-A379-487401547673' DEVICE='iPhone 14 Pro Simulator' VERSION='17.2' APP='' npx codeceptjs run --steps  --grep '@falha'
scripts.browser-android: AMBIENT='remote-android' DEVICE='' PLATFORM='' VERSION='' npx codeceptjs run --steps --reporter mochawesome
scripts.browser-ios: AMBIENT='remote-ios' DEVICE='' PLATFORM='' VERSION='' npx codeceptjs run --steps --reporter mochawesome
